history.description2: Camrose Resort Casino is a modern entertainment destination combining gaming, comfortable accommodation, and diverse amenities. Guests can enjoy a vibrant casino atmosphere with slot machines and table games, while relaxing in cozy hotel rooms. The resort features restaurants, bars, and live entertainment, offering a complete leisure experience.
history.description3: Spacious facilities and friendly staff ensure a welcoming and enjoyable stay. It’s an ideal spot for both gaming enthusiasts and those seeking relaxation and fun.

customHtml.title: Welcome to the World of Camrose Resort Casino
customHtml.description:
Camrose Resort Casino is more than just a casino — it’s a full-scale resort complex that blends excitement, comfort, and entertainment. Located in the scenic city of Camrose, Alberta, it offers guests a unique mix of gaming thrills and cozy hospitality. Whether you're chasing luck or simply looking to unwind, this resort has something for everyone.


The gaming floor features over 200 modern slot machines and a variety of popular table games, including blackjack, Texas Hold’em, and roulette. Regular poker tournaments and themed gaming nights with prize draws add an extra layer of excitement. Skilled and friendly dealers ensure a welcoming atmosphere reminiscent of Las Vegas, but with a Canadian touch.


The on-site hotel offers spacious rooms and suites, some with in-room jacuzzis. Guests can relax in the indoor pool with a waterslide, work out in the fitness center, or enjoy treatments at the spa. Families are welcome, and business travelers will appreciate the conference facilities and business services available.


Food lovers will enjoy the resort’s dining options. Joker’s Den Pub offers a casual vibe with live music and sports broadcasts, while Eats Restaurant serves a diverse menu of Canadian and international cuisine. Evenings often feature live concerts, stand-up comedy, and themed parties, making every night memorable.


Camrose Resort Casino also features generous bonus programs and a loyalty system. Members earn points through play, which can be redeemed for free meals, hotel stays, or access to exclusive events. Frequent guests receive special perks, including complimentary nights and invitations to VIP tournaments.


Camrose Resort Casino: Rules & Dress Code

Camrose Resort Casino offers a welcoming and secure environment for entertainment and relaxation. To ensure a pleasant experience for all guests, please follow these guidelines.


General Entry Requirements

  • • Entry is allowed only for guests 18 years and older. A valid photo ID is required.
  • • Registration is mandatory before entering the gaming area: show your ID, fill out a digital form, and receive a player card.
  • • The casino reserves the right to deny entry to individuals under the influence of alcohol or drugs.

Dress Code

  • • The dress code is casual but neat.
  • • Not allowed: Clothing with offensive language or images; Swimwear, pajamas, or underwear as outerwear; Headwear (except for religious reasons).
  • • Smart casual or business casual attire is recommended

Additional Rules

  • • Photography is prohibited in gaming areas
  • • Smoking is allowed only in designated areas
  • • Pets are not allowed in the casino (except service animals)

Camrose Resort Casino Loyalty Program

Camrose Resort Casino offers the Winner’s Edge loyalty program, designed to reward players for their continued patronage. Membership is free and available to all guests over the age of 18. Signing up is quick and easy — just bring valid ID to the casino.

Members earn points every time they play slots or table games. These points can be redeemed for free play, dining discounts, hotel perks, and exclusive promotions.


Key Benefits

  • • Free membership with instant enrollment
  • • Earn points on every game played
  • • Redeem points for rewards and discounts
  • • Exclusive promotions and prize draws
  • • Dining and hotel discounts
  • • Priority service and VIP events

Tiers & Bonuses

Red Card (Base Tier)

  • • 0–999 points
  • • 5% dining discount
  • • Monthly prize draw entries

Silver Card

  • • 1,000–4,999 points
  • • 10% dining discount
  • • Free drinks at slots
  • • Invitations to special events

Gold Card

  • • 5,000+ points
  • • 15% off dining and hotel stays
  • • Priority service
  • • Monthly bonuses up to $100
  • • Personal host

customHtml_2.title: Entertainment and Gaming at Camrose Resort Casino
customHtml_2.description:
Bonuses, Wins & Entertainment at Camrose Resort Casino

Camrose Resort Casino offers more than just gaming — it’s a full entertainment destination with exciting bonuses, seasonal events, and special offers that enhance every visit.


Key Offers and Promotions

  • • Frequent prize draws and jackpots — win thousands in cash.
  • • Seasonal events — themed parties, concerts, and festive dinners.
  • • Hotel + Casino packages — stay longer, save more.
  • • Special dinners and live shows — like Christmas parties with music.
  • • Gaming tournaments — poker, blackjack, roulette competitions.
  • • Gift certificates and discounts — for rooms, dining, and entertainment.
  • • Newsletter exclusives — early access to deals and tickets.

Details on Bonuses and Events

Progressive Jackpots

  • • Slot machines with in-house and province-wide jackpots.
  • • Example wins: $10,000+ on popular slots.

Table Game Tournaments

  • • Regular events in Ultimate Texas Hold’em, blackjack, roulette.
  • • Prize pools: $500–$5,000.
  • • Often held on weekends and holidays.

Seasonal Events

  • • Small Business Christmas Party

“Ultimate Getaway” Package

  • • Book 2 nights, get the 3rd night free.
  • • Rate: $189/night + tax.
  • • Includes free parking and Wi-Fi.

Themed Dinners & Shows

  • • Example: Surf & Turf dinner — $38.
  • • Live music in the Regal Ballroom: rock, pop, country.

Newsletter Perks

  • • Get exclusive offers, early access to events, and more.

Popular Games at Camrose Resort Casino

Camrose Resort Casino offers a well-rounded gaming experience with a mix of classic table games, modern slots, and poker tournaments. Whether you're a casual player or a seasoned gambler, there's something for everyone on the gaming floor.


Slot Machines

  • • Over 200 machines from Aristocrat and IGT.
  • • Themes: adventure, fantasy, fruits, classics.
  • • Bets: $0.01 to $5.
  • • Examples: Pompeii, More Hearts, Way to Go.
  • • Progressive jackpots: up to $10,000+

Blackjack

  • • Available daily.
  • • Minimum bet: $1–$5.
  • • Great for strategic and casual players.

Roulette

  • • European and American versions.
  • • Bet on numbers, colors, or ranges.
  • • Classic casino excitement.

Ultimate Texas Hold’em

  • • Poker variant played against the dealer.
  • • Popular in weekend tournaments.
  • • Combines skill and luck.

Poker Room

  • • Cash games and weekly tournaments.
  • • Prize pools: $500–$5,000.
  • • Friendly, competitive atmosphere.

Minimum and Maximum Bets at Camrose Resort Casino

Camrose Resort Casino offers a wide range of betting options to suit every player — from casual slot fans to high-stakes table game enthusiasts. Whether you're playing for fun or aiming for big wins, you'll find a game that fits your style.


Game Type Minimum Bet Maximum Bet
Slot Machines 0.01 CAD 5 CAD
Video Lottery Terminals 0.05 CAD 2 CAD
Blackjack 5 CAD 500 CAD
Roulette 2 CAD 200 CAD
Ultimate Texas Hold’em 5 CAD 250 CAD
Poker (Tournaments) 20 CAD (buy-in) 5000 CAD (prize pool)

Entertainment & Events at Camrose Resort Casino

Camrose Resort Casino is more than just a gaming destination — it’s a vibrant hub for entertainment and social gatherings. The heart of the action is the Regal Ballroom, a spacious and elegant venue that hosts a wide range of events, from live concerts and themed parties to corporate functions and weddings. With a capacity of up to 300 guests, it’s the perfect setting for unforgettable nights out.


One of the most anticipated events is the Annual Small Business Christmas Party, held every December. This festive celebration features a gourmet buffet, live entertainment (such as the high-energy 80s tribute band Rubix Cubed), and a beautifully decorated ballroom. Themed musical nights are also a regular feature, offering everything from country and rock to pop and retro hits. Guests can enjoy dinner and a show, followed by drinks and dancing.


The Joker’s Den Pub, located within the casino, is a hotspot for nightly entertainment. It features live bands, DJ sets, karaoke nights, and sports broadcasts. On weekends, it transforms into a lively nightclub, staying open until 2:00 AM. Whether you're winding down after a game or looking for a fun night out, the pub offers a relaxed yet energetic atmosphere.


Entertainment & Events at a Glance

  • • Live Concerts at Regal Ballroom: Rock, pop, country, retro nights, and themed shows.
  • • Small Business Christmas Party: Dinner, 80s music, festive décor.
  • • Joker’s Den Pub Live music, DJs, karaoke, pool, sports. Open till 2:00 AM on weekends.
  • • Themed Dinners & Shows: Example: Surf & Turf dinner with live music .
  • • Private Events & Banquets: Weddings, corporate parties, birthdays with full service.
  • • Special Event Nights: Comedy shows, trivia nights, and seasonal parties.

Dining & Relaxation at Camrose Resort Casino

Camrose Resort Casino is more than just a gaming destination — it’s a full-service resort offering excellent dining, cozy accommodations, and a variety of leisure options. Whether you're visiting for a weekend getaway, a business trip, or a family vacation, the resort provides everything you need for a comfortable and entertaining stay.


Guests can enjoy two on-site restaurants, a lively pub, a spa and wellness center, and a hotel with spacious rooms and suites. The resort also features banquet halls for weddings and events, and is conveniently located near downtown Camrose, offering access to local attractions, shopping, and theaters.


Dining & Leisure Venues at Camrose Resort Casino

Rosie’s Family Restaurant

  • • Family-friendly dining with a cozy vibe.
  • • Open daily from 5:00 PM to 9:00 PM.
  • • Menu: steaks, pasta, seafood, kids’ meals.

Joker’s Den Pub

  • • Pub with live bands, DJs, and sports screens.
  • • Hours: Sun–Thu: 11 AM–9 PM (midnight); Fri–Sat: 11 AM–11 PM (2 AM)
  • • Pool tables, snacks, cocktails, and beer.

Camrose Resort Casino Hotel

  • • Room types: standard, suites, family, jacuzzi rooms.
  • • Amenities: free Wi-Fi, parking, gym, business center.
  • • Pool and waterslide temporarily closed for repairs.

Spa & Wellness Center

  • • Hot tub, massages, facial and body treatments.
  • • Ideal for post-casino relaxation.

Regal Ballroom

  • • Elegant venue for weddings, banquets, and shows.
  • •Hosts concerts, parties, and seasonal dinners.

items.title: What payment methods are accepted at the casino?
items.answer: We accept cash, debit and credit cards (Visa, MasterCard), and gift certificates.

items.title: Can I use foreign currency?
items.answer: No, all transactions are conducted in Canadian dollars (CAD).

items.title: Do I need to register to enter the casino?
items.answer: No registration is required, but valid photo ID may be requested at the entrance.

items.title: What languages does the staff speak?
items.answer: English is the primary language. Some staff also speak French.
